entry.title: RAND Experts Available on Health Care Reform: How Many People May Be Covered? How to Cut Costs; Implications for Quality
entry.summary: Experts from RAND Health are available to discuss the ongoing national debate over health care reform. Issues where RAND has unique expertise: history of nation's health care system; estimates of how many uninsured may be covered by reform; strategies to slow rising health care costs; impact rising health care costs have on employment and nation's economy; how health reform might affect health care quality and whether quality can be improved as coverage is extended to more uninsured.
